---
mode: 'agent'
description: 'Write a high-signal MEMORY.md entry documenting a technical decision, workaround, or known issue.'
---

Update docs/MEMORY.md.

Ask for (if missing):
- Decision date (default: today)
- Topic
- Context/problem
- Options considered
- Final decision
- Consequences/tradeoffs
- Files touched

Write the entry using the existing MEMORY.md style.

Constraints:
- Be concise and searchable.
- Document “why”, not just “what”.
